Text: Kele Jihofa, O onugo-mi!
uwe̩ kʼe̩ kʼugane̩ bʼo̩la-we̩ ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼotogbo,
kʼi akʼigbo oli unyi-wñ ojale nyane̩ ef omi omi,
uwe̩ kʼi akʼafu chʼamonuche̩-we̩,
I dʼane̩ ile̩-i gugu uña-wñ,
Uwe̩ mʼunefu le̩ ko bʼo̩la-wñ ma dabe̩ne̩ kʼafe̩;
Uka kʼe̩ nu oñ ma ra;
Uwo uwo kwane̩, o̩go̩ o̩go̩ hi wane̩
Uwe̩ fʼo̩me̩ hite̩ kʼama ki we edaba,
I aje̩ ñw e̩bi omi e̩bi omi cha nyʼef o̩go̩ o̩go̩:
i adʼomi ñw e̩wñ iñmi oko okoke du ñmo̩;
Ame̩we̩ ojale nʼodo e-ma o̩la-wñ;
I achʼomi kwef unyi-wñ agba nyʼuwo uwo le̩;
I aje̩ ñw egbe ki lu tod ame̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩,
kpai omi achiwebe̩te̩ma ki abʼone̩ e̩do̩,
Efu ujo̩ oli Jihofa ko̩ me̩,
O̩mo̩ ame̩we̩ kʼunyi-ma jo̩;
Uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba chʼutodu ame-wo oko;
I dʼochu te̩ tod iko iko;
Uwe̩ dʼe̩chubi te̩, oñ i mud odu,
Amo̩ma idu kwa rʼame̩la ku ma che ku ma mu ubi,
Olu kwane̩, ma le ma
One̩ adufu nyʼokuko̩lo̩-wñ
O Jihofa, uko̩lo̩-we̩ chʼojoji ojoji!
Ohimini abadi te̩ o̩mo̩ le̩, i che-nana i la chenabe̩,
O̩mo̩ o̩ko̩ o̩ko̩ ale,
Abo-i chaka jʼakejurʼe̩,
E̩wñ kʼe̩ ko ñw ma, ma yajo̩;
Uwe̩ dʼeju-we̩ maja, ma dejiji;
Uwe̩ fʼAfu-we̩ kpe̩ dufu, ma che̩nyi te̩;
Ojima Jihofa ki nado̩mo̩ ogbegbele̩,
i ago ane̩ ile̩ oñ i chane̩ ega,
Nakeli ñw Jihofa gbogbo mʼo̩jo̩ uku-mi;
Ibe kʼu nakpe̩ ki rinyo̩ ñw u,
Ame̩nadure ki lie̩ bʼane̩ ile̩ te̩,
